review_title: Totally recommended to have a fun time.
one_reviews_text: Hilarious !!! Addictive and very entertaining, it works great on my old CV1, good graphics (in its style) and super fluid. Congratulations, at least the demo is very good.
Good and fun game, but my controllers sometimes stuck in one place

Probably the worst game I have ever played, VR or no VR. In fact, this game would probably be better on a flatscreen… it's so bad that I showed a friend who had never been in VR my headset, he tried this game, and he still said it was awful... and if a VR game is so bad that it overcomes the beautiful novelty that is virtual reality and a first-timer hates it? You know it's bad.

Now for actual constructive feedback, instead of just ranting. Shooting mechanics? Broken. Hitting people in the head barely does anything to low-level enemies, you have to headshot multiple times in order to get a kill sometimes. Graphics? Terrible, even on max settings. Shooting at cardboard cutouts while a man in a fake western accent drawls at you just isn't fun. Everything about this game is just a complete waste of money, or if you have the free version, a waste of disk space. Please, don't play it. Even the intro menu took me time to figure out, and I wasn't even in the game yet.

review_title: Really great and at a really great price
one_reviews_text: Cant wait to get the full game
Graphics, story, level selection all good. If only it was a moving game. I've only played 2 levels. It is exactly what the game says it is, a western shooter!

For a demo game there is a lot to play with, multiple levels.
This is a wave shooter but with humour.
Its addictive, crazy, and simple.
Graphics are fantastic, the cartoon style fits in very well.
This demo is actually making me wishlist the full game! (waiting for a sale as I always do)

review_title: Awesome game. But Rift S is slow
one_reviews_text: The game is very cool and a lot of fun. I would have rated 5 stars if it had not been for the slow performance of the Rift S. When shooting the guns do not react as responsive and fast on Rift S as they do on Rift.

The demo worked fine but I just bought it and it refuses to play now ! It says I've to uninstall but I can't uninstall anymore because the option uninstall is not there anymore, I only have the option to install and when I click on it, it starts installing then says that there is a problem and that's it. Each time I try to install, it's the same thing going on again. Come on ! We're not beta testers ! I work in the IT industry, you guys have to test your stuff first before making people pay for it just to find out it doesn't work correctly...

I downloaded the preface a while back but never got around to playing it.  Today, I decided to play the preface with open expectations.  At first I was thrown off using the basic revolvers with so many enemies being thrown at me.  I thought the graphics and sound effects are great for what they are as well as the touch control responses.  

Once I started using the other weapons the game finally clicked for me and I ended up purchasing the full game which happened to be on sale.

I would give it 4.5 if I could.  Minus half a star for no mulitplayer.

review_title: Made my Dad (61 yo) smile so BIG (TU!)
one_reviews_text: This game made my Pop move like a teenager again as he hid behind barrels and was deflecting bullets with his guns.  He was having so much fun that I had him sit down and took his blood pressure to make sure he was OK.
Holy cow that was intense!

I ve just finished the preface and i really love everything!! Story, Guns, Sounds, Enemies, Levels.
I Will buy the bulletproof definitely.
Very fun game. Awesome shooter, very well made!

one_reviews_text: Very nice combination of story, humor, and action.  Motivating to shoot'em'all!  It's a short demo, but I couldn't stop playing it over and over!  Very uniqe in what you can do... haven't see anything like that in any other shoot'em up VR.  If you even remotely like shoot'em games... at least download this free demo!  Well done!  Can't wait to see the full release!
Well worth the free download. Does make my hand hurt with all that shooting. Can't wait for the full game. It was unique and fun!
